chapters.title: Early Graffiti Days
chapters.description: KAWS began his artistic journey in Jersey City, transforming street corners into expressive canvases. His signature skull and crossbones tag quickly became a whispered legend — a statement of rebellion and creative freedom during the underground graffiti boom.
chapters.quote: Street walls were my first galleries.

chapters.title: Crossing Worlds: From Streets to Studios
chapters.description: As his street art evolved, KAWS began transforming familiar cartoon characters into surreal sculptures. He bridged the world between commercial imagery and fine art — exploring how nostalgia and consumerism coexist in the modern mind.
chapters.quote: I’ve always wanted to make something that felt both familiar and strange.

chapters.title: The Rise of Companion
chapters.description: Then came the Companion — a symbol of empathy, loneliness, and human fragility. With crossed-out eyes and a childlike frame, this character transcended toy design to become an emotional mirror for millions. Museums, collectors, and fans embraced the figure worldwide.
chapters.quote: Companion represents empathy, sadness, and the comfort of shared emotion.

chapters.title: Global Collaborations: Dior, Uniqlo & Beyond
chapters.description: KAWS blurred the boundaries of art, fashion, and commerce — collaborating with global icons like Dior, Uniqlo, and Nike. His ability to merge high fashion with street language gave birth to a new visual culture — democratic, stylish, and deeply emotional.
chapters.quote: Art doesn’t belong to one world — it belongs to everyone.

chapters.title: KAWS: The Digital Renaissance
chapters.description: Today, KAWS explores digital art, NFTs, and large-scale augmented reality exhibitions. His works float above skylines, appear in virtual museums, and live in the hands of fans worldwide. The spirit of his graffiti roots remains — rebellion reimagined through technology.
chapters.quote: My art will always evolve, but the message never changes — connection.

artworks.title: Jersey City Graffiti
artworks.description: Early work from the streets of Jersey City, where KAWS developed his signature style.

artworks.title: Sketchbook
artworks.description: A glimpse into the artist's process, showing the evolution of his iconic characters.

artworks.title: Untitled (Kimpsons)
artworks.description: A subversion of pop culture icons, a recurring theme in KAWS's work.

artworks.title: Companion
artworks.description: The first appearance of the iconic Companion, a symbol of empathy and loneliness.

artworks.title: Dior Collaboration
artworks.description: Merging high fashion and street art, this collaboration redefined brand partnerships.

artworks.title: Digital Artwork
artworks.description: KAWS explores new frontiers by bringing his art into the digital and virtual realms.

artworks.title: Spray Art
artworks.description: An example of KAWS's early ad-busting, altering public advertisements with his art.

artworks.title: Holiday: Japan
artworks.description: The KAWS:HOLIDAY project brought monumental sculptures to locations around the world.
